Text:
Didn't work for me.
Had 6.7.7.0, installed over, used the supplied keyfile -> NOT registered. Had to go back to 6.7.7.0 -> everything ok again.

Any help?

This is version 6.7.8.0 , the key file provided for this one, and it's the final version. If you installed any old version uninstall it completely, install the new version, restart the computer, just double click on the provided key file ,it's registered(Follow the instructions given).Cheers! :)

Worked perfectly for me.

1) unplugged router
2) installed anydvd
3) rebooted
4) allowed AnyDvd to open
5) Closed anyDvd
6) double-clicked on the "Key" file
7) reopened AnyDvd
9) Profit!

It seems to be great and working well, and I thank you.
Thanks man!!! its works for me....well done..

Adding to my previous comment: Just finished using AnyDvd and Handbrake to make a copy of "RED".  The audio and video were perfect.  The only problem I came across was that the chapter title "Chapter 1, 2, 3, etc" was imprinted across the bottom of the video.  I'm currently testing some theories on what is causing it, but I don't think it's AnyDvd.

AnyDVD & AnyDVD HD 6.7.8.0+Key [Br].rar
